title: Bug 23935 - Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both the Tree widget and Text widget are children of the shell. The right tree and text only work as expected on Windows. To work around this issue, we can create the text editor as a sibling of the tree and move it above the tree.
OB: When running build 20020920 and executing the provided code, the left tree and text behave correctly on both Windows and Linux.
EB: When running build 20020920 and executing the provided code, the right tree and text do not behave correctly on both Windows and Linux.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Use build 20020920.
2. Run the attached code.
3. Observe the behavior of the right tree and text on both Windows and Linux.
